transformation_logic: IF Product Group in ( L002, ZMGRP1,202R ) THEN 'GENAI01' ELSE IF Product Group in ( '01','L001','ZSUK1RM1') THEN 'GENAI02' ELSE IF Product Group in ( 'CH001','02') THEN 'GenAI03' ELSE 'GenAINo'
Resolved_query: IF Product Group in MARA table is one of ( L002, ZMGRP1,202R ) THEN assign value 'GENAI01'. ELSE, IF Product Group is one of ( '01','L001','ZSUK1RM1') THEN assign value 'GENAI02'. ELSE, IF Product Group is one of ( 'CH001','02') THEN assign value 'GenAI03'. ELSE assign 'GenAINo'.
